document_data.caption: Tongs.
document_data.name: Tongs
document_data.mainbody: '''Tongs''' were items in the Realms often used by [[wizard]]s or craftsmen to grasp burning hot objects.
document_data.Description: Tongs were elongated pieces of metal connected at one end.
document_data.Availability: These items were available for purchase through ''[[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]]'' for 1 to 3 [[gold piece]]s depending on the size.
document_data.Notable Tongs: * ''[[Tongs of the armorer]]'', an enchanted pair of tongs that were used by the best craftsmen of ancient [[Myth Drannor]].
